quest.description_key: Staying alive means staying healthy and staying healthy starts with eating a healthy diet. Build a Food Prep Table to more efficiently break down food. You can also store your food serving and cook more nutritious meals on it.

Having a place to stash your supplies is a must but if you don't have the materials or smarts to craft one you can always pick one up. Destroying Backpacks, Sports Bags, Purses and Trash bags will let you pick them up and replace them for easy storage. Grab a few to use for latter.

You will need a lot of things to survive in True Survival and you will need somewhere to keep them. Before you can learn more complex secure storage containers Storage Sacks will be all you can craft. Craft one to stash your supplies in.

In True Survival Firearms are hard to come by, especially in early game. To help you survive you can hand craft your first set of firearms. Get started by crafting a crafted Revolver and killing some zombies.

In True Survival Firearms are hard to come by, especially in early game. To help you survive you can hand craft your first set of firearms. Get started by crafting a crafted Revolver and killing some zombies.

In True Survival Firearms are hard to come by, especially in early game. To help you survive you can hand craft your first set of firearms. Get started by crafting a blunderbuss and killing some zombies.

In True Survival Firearms are hard to come by, especially in early game. To help you survive you can hand craft your first set of firearms. Get started by crafting a blunderbuss and killing some zombies.

In True Survival Firearms are hard to come by, especially in early game. To help you survive you can hand craft your first set of firearms. Get started by crafting a crafted Rifle and killing some zombies.

In True Survival Firearms are hard to come by, especially in early game. To help you survive you can hand craft your first set of firearms. Get started by crafting a crafted Rifle and killing some zombies.

quest.subtitle_key: Please add text here to finish me
quest.description_key: Before you learn to build frames it can be hard to barricade doors and windows. Craft these Planks and use them for early building and securing buildings.
If you want to learn to build wood structures you're going to need the proper tools to do it. Craft or find a Claw Hammer to begin to learn this skill.

Now that you have the right tool for the job all that's left to do is gather some supplies. Use the claw hammer to break down wooden blocks and retrieve the upgrade materials from them. Collect enough and you will learn the frames for rebuilding the blocks.
Now that you have gotten used to taking the material apart try and build some frames yourself.
Now that you figured out how to build frames practice upgrading them to master the craft..
If you want to learn to build cobblestone structures you're going to need the proper tools to do it. Craft or find a cobblestone Hammer to begin to learn this skill.

Now that you have the right tool for the job all that's left to do is gather some supplies. Use the cobblestone hammer to break down cobblestone blocks and retrieve the upgrade materials from them. Collect enough and you will learn the frames for rebuilding the blocks.
Now that you have gotten used to taking the material apart try and build some frames yourself.
Now that you figured out how to build frames practice upgrading them to master the craft..
If you want to learn to build brick structures you're going to need the proper tools to do it. Craft or find a brick Hammer to begin to learn this skill.

Now that you have the right tool for the job all that's left to do is gather some supplies. Use the brick hammer to break down brick blocks and retrieve the upgrade materials from them. Collect enough and you will learn the frames for rebuilding the blocks.
Now that you have gotten used to taking the material apart try and build some frames yourself.
Now that you figured out how to build frames practice upgrading them to master the craft..
If you want to learn to build Concrete structures you're going to need the proper tools to do it. Craft or find a Concrete Sledge to begin to learn this skill.

Now that you have the right tool for the job all that's left to do is gather some supplies. Use the Concrete sledge to break down Concrete blocks and retrieve the upgrade materials from them. Collect enough and you will learn the frames for rebuilding the blocks.
Now that you have gotten used to taking the material apart try and build some frames yourself.
Now that you figured out how to build frames practice upgrading them to master the craft..

quest.name_key: Learning to build with Reinforced Concrete
quest.subtitle_key: Learning to build with Reinforced Concrete
quest.description_key: If you want to learn to build Reinforced Concrete structures you're going to need the proper tools to do it. Craft or find a Reinforced Concrete Bar to begin to learn this skill.

quest.name_key: Learning to build with Reinforced Concrete
quest.subtitle_key: Learning to build with Reinforced Concrete
quest.description_key: Now that you have the right tool for the job all that's left to do is gather some supplies. Use the Reinforced Concrete bar to break down Reinforced Concrete blocks and retrieve the upgrade materials from them. Collect enough and you will learn the frames for rebuilding the blocks.

quest.description_key: Now that you have gotten used to taking the material apart try and build some frames yourself.

quest.description_key: Now that you figured out how to build frames practice upgrading them to master the craft..
If you want to learn to build iron structures you're going to need the proper tools to do it. Craft or find a wrench to begin to learn this skill.

Now that you have the right tool for the job all that's left to do is gather some Scrap Iron Sheets. Use the wrench to break down iron blocks and retrieve the Scrap Iron Sheet from them. Collect enough and you will learn the frames for rebuilding the blocks.
Now that you have gotten used to taking the material apart try and build some frames yourself.
Now that you figured out how to build frames practice upgrading them to master the craft..
If you want to learn to build steel structures you're going to need the proper tools to do it. Craft or find a welder tool to begin to learn this skill.

Now that you have the right tool for the job all that's left to do is gather some Scrap Steel Sheet. Use the welder tool to break down steel blocks and retrieve the Scrap Steel Sheet from them. Collect enough and you will learn the frames for rebuilding the blocks.
Now that you have gotten used to taking the material apart try and build some frames yourself.
Now that you figured out how to build frames practice upgrading them to master the craft..

You can't live off moldy Twinkies forever and sooner or later all the food in the world will spoil so you better know how to grow your own by then. Let's start off with something easy. Collect these tree seeds and plant them to begin your Farming quest chain.When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

You can't be a farmer without a hoe so get one made. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Now craft and plant some Cotton Seeds. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Now craft and plant some Potato Seeds. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Now craft and plant some Goldenrod Seeds. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Now craft and plant some Corn Seeds. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Now craft and plant some Chrysanthemum Seeds. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Now craft and plant some carrot Seeds. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Now craft and plant some wheat Seeds. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Now craft and plant some apple Seeds. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Now craft and plant some Mushroom Seeds. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Now craft and plant some Blueberry Seeds. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Now craft and plant some Yucca Seeds. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Now craft and plant some Aloe Seeds. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.

Any squirrel can plant a nut and grow a tree but it takes Farmer that can make fertilizer to increase crop yields. To finish off your farming quest chain create some fertilizer. When you complete these quest you will receive a Farmer's Almanac that when read will unlock the next Farming perk. Be sure to have inventory room when completing and read the book immediately.
